solution_line_template: The shop owner added {bikes_added_per_week} bikes every week for {weeks_per_month} weeks for a total addition of {bikes_added_per_week}*{weeks_per_month} = <<{bikes_added_per_week}*{weeks_per_month}={total_bikes_added}>>{total_bikes_added} bikes
The original number of bikes = {bikes_in_stock_final}-{total_bikes_added}+{bikes_sold} = <<{bikes_in_stock_final}-{total_bikes_added}+{bikes_sold}={original_bikes}>>{original_bikes} bikes
